website_summaries.verdict: Fila Disruptor 2 shoes are for when you want to make a statement but don’t want that statement to be too loud. The basic white shoes are given a chic edge courtesy of the stocky build and elevated soles, which in turn delight people who love the added height.The shoes don’t just rely on style to sell. These low-tops are crazy comfy, and they hold up well even after months of almost every day wear. So go ahead and keep these in your shoe rotation—they should last you a long time.
pros: Disruptor 2 shoes by Fila are a great and fun twist to your basic white sneakers, many users say
These are super comfy kicks, plenty of testers have noted
According to many Fila Disruptor 2 shoe reviewers, they love the thick soles, which easily add around two inches to their height
The shoes are quite durable, a good number of people have reported, because you can wear them almost daily for months, and they’ll still hold up well
Fila Disruptor 2 sneakers make any outfit look good and trendy, a few have claimed
These are among Fila’s chunky shoes that are priced affordably, some say
A handful of purchasers have remarked that the Fila Disruptor 2s feel light on the feet
A small number of consumers are pleased that the low-cut sneakers are surprisingly easy to clean off
Two people have commended the quality construction of the shoes
The sizing of Fila Disruptor sneakers is accurate to measurement
cons: A couple of people have reported that the low-tops contain no arch support
The Fila Disruptor 2 sneakers have limited colorways

customer_reviews.title: Not a quality product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am usually a 9.5. I had heard that Fila were on the small side with their sizes so I ordered a size 10. The fit is snug but Comfortable. Unfortunately they didn’t last a year. 3 times to the cobbler to be repaired. When the soles started to fall off I decided to throw them. I can’t help thinking that they were not originals and were probably fake. I always remember Fila to be a mark of quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Davcho

customer_reviews.title: Very smart.
customer_reviews.text: Very smart, i bought the white version aswell. Good strong grip sole.
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Good to start with
customer_reviews.text: Very good at first but only lasted two months before the toe on the right shoe split a shame as were very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: mark waite

customer_reviews.title: fit like a glove
customer_reviews.text: fila trainers very good value and very they fit perfect

customer_reviews.title: Bad fit - good hype
customer_reviews.text: Came way to large but no point returning now because I like the hype
customer_reviews.author: Ben park

customer_reviews.title: great shoes, sold out in all UK high street ...
customer_reviews.text: great shoes, sold out in all UK high street stores so ordered on here. Thought i was ordering a 7 but actually an US 7.5 is a UK 6.5. Still fit fine though.
customer_reviews.author: Harriet lomas

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, however, the size chart is wrong: they were supposed to be UK8 but they're a UK7.5
customer_reviews.author: krisztina parti

customer_reviews.title: One very happy daughter!
customer_reviews.text: Delivery arrived earlier than expected.. One very happy daughter !!
customer_reviews.author: Mr A K P Southam

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are pristine and comfortable, I'm extremely happy
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are pristine and comfortable, I'm extremely happy! The delivery was so quick, was surprised considering it's the week before Christmas.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: ... uk 11 and recieved uk 10 the quality are good i just cannot wear them as the size is ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered uk 11 and recieved uk 10 the quality are good i just cannot wear them as the size is too small
customer_reviews.author: adam sparkes

customer_reviews.title: The quality is not perfect but they are not bad either
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if they are the original ones. The quality is not perfect but they are not bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Griefy

customer_reviews.title: Wear them all the time!
customer_reviews.text: Came early, comfiest shoes I own and much better quality then I expected!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Fila Disruptor II, Men's Sneaker
product_meta.description: The [SERIES] by [BRAND] is more supportive than your average shoe. This shoe is perfect for people with an active style. Whether your life involves walking, jogging, or being on your feet frequently, this shoe will support you. Robust [FABRIC1] combines with heavy-duty [SOLE] sole to ensure a long lifespan for your favorite everyday-wear shoes. Built to support and cushion your feet all day long, their strategically engineered design with extra comfort assures you that no matter what the day throws at you, you can take it and keep going.
feature_bullets: Leather-Synthetic Blend - The blending of both real and synthetic leather with this Fila shoe has created a lighter shoe that's a lot more durable, yet still retains that full-grain leather look.
Molded Rubber Outsole - As an athletic sneaker, Fila ups and ante and strength and durability, particularly with this strong, flexible, durable rubber outsole.
Embroidered Logo - While a minor detail to some, having the logo embroidered onto the shoe means that it's there permanently, so it's not going to leave a spot on the shoe where it falls off.
Removable Cushioned Insole - Not only does this insole provide plenty of comfort for men who like to remain active, but it's also removable and washable, so you can keep your shoes fresh.

Lightweight EVA Midsole - The midsole of a shoe provides stability and a barrier between the upper and outsole, and this light EVA molded midsole gives you strength and stability without added weight.
